text: Anthony Claude Leach, Jr., known as Buddy Leach (March 30, 1934 - August 6, 2022) was an American businessman and Democratic politician. For one term, he was a U.S. Representative for Louisiana's 4th congressional district. He also was a member of the Louisiana House of Representatives and as chairman of the Louisiana Democratic Party. In 2003, he was a candidate for governor of Louisiana.
